text: jo log apane maal khuda kee raah mein kharch karate hain aur phir kharch karane ke baad kisee tarah ka ehasaan nahin jataate hain aur na jinapar ehasaan kiya hai unako sataate hain unaka ajr (va savaab) unake paravaradigaar ke paas hai aur na aakherat mein unapar koee khauf hoga aur na vah gamageen honge
